modName: Otrera -Greek Goddess of the Amazons- Companion
summary: My Otrera Companion is available as Immortal (essential) at a calculated level 30 or as a non-essential Auto-Level. She is a master with the bow and two handed sword but has no spells in her inventory. That said since she is an Olympian goddess I equipped her with Unrelenting Force and the Disarm Shouts. Located in Dawnstar at the Windpeak Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m38/novapd44/Otrera4.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[color=cornflowerblue][b]Otrera is the ancestral mother-goddess of the Amazon tribes of Earth. Her exact lineage is unknown but it is rumored she is the daughter of Zeus and Harmonia, the Goddess of Order and future Queen of Thebes. In another account she is referred to as the daughter of Gaea, the ancestral mother of all the gods of Earth. There is a third story that links her to the throne of Phrygia, either the sister or daughter of King Otreus, a son of Poseidon. She is also credited with teaching the art of warfare to Ares and the divine twins, Apollo and Artemis.[/b][/color]

[b]My Otrera Companion is available as Immortal (essential) at a calculated level 30 or as a non-essential Auto-Level. She is a master with the bow and two handed sword but has no spells in her inventory. Because she is an Olympian goddess I did equip her with Unrelenting Force and Disarm Shouts (Note she only uses dragon language with even toned voice version). She is tall at about 6\'3\" and weighs a proportionate 145 pounds given her stature. I equipped Otrera with weapons fit for a goddess. Her inventory includes an enchanted Ebony Great-sword of Shock and also an enchanted Ebony Bow of Shock with 100 Ebony arrows. Some of her facial features were taken from Greek model and actress Tonia Sotiropoulou (recently selected to be a Bond Girl in the upcoming 007 movie \"Skyfall\"). She is located in Dawnstar at the Windpeak Inn.[/b] 

[b][color=cornflowerblue]Edit: For those that are interested she is of the Imperial race.[/b][/color]

She is wearing a mashup I created of Mak\'s Remodeled CBBE Armor and wristbands from Gatti\'s Branwen Armor. This was done by using the console to add the various armor pieces to her inventory. Type in console: help arms, pauldron, belt, bikini etc... [b](She will appear nude in your game!)[/b]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14340

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 with Navetseas body textures and then SvarogNL\'s CBBE UNP Fitness Body texture over that. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16731

I used Bella\'s Better Females and makeup variant 1 on her in combination with pretty lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

[B][COLOR=RED]***ApachiiSkyHair is REQUIRED!***[/B][/COLOR]

[b]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b]
author: FalmerBane
